Description.Details: This rare type of Thunderbolt ammo gives flexibility to large single-missile launchers for times when getting any hit is more important than hitting hard. After launch the missile separates into four independently seeing warheads each equivalent to a TBM5. If they lose their lock on the primary target they will attempt to acquire any nearby target. Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Left Click on Ammo count during battle to swap Ammo Type. Ctrl+click on ammunition counter to eject ammo.
Description.Name: Thunderbolt 20 Ammo
